content: k1 with cc2 k5 with mc around round 3 k1 with mc k3 with cc2 k4 with mc around a note on color dominance your diamond color is your round 4 k5 with cc2 k3 with mc around pattern color in each band so that is the color you will hold in round 5 work as for round 3 your left hand bringing it up from underneath the background round 6 work as for round 2 color in each diamond band should be held in your right hand round 7 work as for round 1 bringing it over the pattern color break cc2 directions for cowl with ac knit two full rounds cast on and ribbing with mc and gauge needle cast on 184 sts fourth band join in the round without a twist round 1 k around with cc1 ribbing round k2 p2 around round 2 k6 with cc1 k1 with mc k1 with cc1 around repeat ribbing round a total of six times first band round 1 k around with cc1 round 2 k2 with cc1 k1 with mc k5 with cc1 around round 3 k1 with cc1 k3 with mc k4 with cc1 around round 4 k5 with mc k3 with cc1 around round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 round 7 work as for round 1 break mc with ac knit two full rounds second band round 1 k around with cc2 round 2 k6 with cc2 k1 with cc1 k1 with cc2 around round 3 k5 with cc2 k3 with cc1 around round 4 k1 with cc1 k3 with cc2 k4 with cc1 around round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 diamond cowl version 1 // ©2024 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission round 3 k5 with cc1 k3 with mc around next round with ac k1 k2tog k6 to last 7 sts k2tog k5 161 sts remain round 4 k1 with mc k3 with cc1 k4 with mc around round 5 work as for round 3 sixth band round 6 work as for round 2 round 1 k around with mc round 7 work as for round 1 round 2 k5 with mc k1 with cc2 k1 with mc around break mc round 3 k4 with mc k3 with cc2 around round 4 k1 with cc2 k2 with mc k4 with cc2 around with ac knit two full rounds round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 fifth band round 7 work as for round 1 round 1 k around with cc2 break cc2 round 2 k2 with cc2 k1 with cc1 k5 with cc2 around round 3 k1 with cc2 k3
